ResearchProjectDef.label: Astra Militarum armory
ResearchProjectDef.description:
++++++ Adeptus Mechanicus Archives ++++++

[STC Fragment Λ/Φ-96]

This STC fragment contains information regarding manufacturing means of personal protection equipment commonly used by the Astra Militarum (also known as the Imperial Guard) personnel. They range from lightweight flak armor, which is cheap and easy to manufacture, to heavier types, such as carapace armor, commonly used by stormtroopers and elite units.

ResearchProjectDef.description:
++++++ Adeptus Mechanicus Archives ++++++

[STC Fragment Λ/Φ-99]

This STC fragment contains information regarding manufacturing less advanced suits of power armor commonly used by the members of different branches of the Inquisition as well as the Adepta Sororitas.
